content: this skirtie was created to be crocheted onto any wool soaker cloth diaper cover the soaker in the picture is knitted but it can easily be done with a crocheted soaker this could also be created just as a cute skirt without using it as a soaker you could easily use a soaker pattern with a fiber other than wool or wool if you like and then just put it over a disposable diaper and you d have a cute little skirt with an underskirt
